DataElement.preferredName: Intervention Not Completed Or Interrupted Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field used to describe the reason the intervention was modified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Activity or measure that produces an effect or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in patient or population. This is a general term encompassing medical, social, behavioral, environmental and other acts that can have preventive and/or therapeutic impact.__A time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something._Or; used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or ministration that produces an effect or that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or ministration that produces an effect or that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Interruption; a time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something.:Or; used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: A time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Be specific about something; define clearly.
